text.author: Raquel Fernández González, María Elena Arce Fariña and María Dolores Garza Gil
text.title: Resolving Conflict between Parties and Consequences for Foreign Direct Investment: The Repsol-YPF Case in Argentina
text.summary: This study discusses the implications of nations appropriating assets in contradiction with property rights using the example of the Argentine State's expropriation of YPF.
